p: For SNP rs1491942 in the LRRK2 gene, the estimated risk association under an additive model was odds ratio (OR) 1.71 [1.22–2.40] p 0.002. The selected SNPs’ genomic localization is shown in Fig. 1; no deviation from Hardy–Weinberg equilibrium (HWE) is observed in the control group. The allelic, genotyping distribution, and OR estimation of the SNPs are shown in Table 2.
